June 27, 2015 D Ohio Brass Arts Festival
Ohio Brass Arts Festival 0 Other
ohio-brass-art-festival
Creekside, Gahanna, Ohio, USA Best March - Dublin Silver Band (Simoraine) Best Slow Melody - Brass Band of Columbus (The Last Spring)
March/Melody=Total 1. Columbus 2.5/1=3.5 2. Filmore Philharmonic 2.5/2=4.5 3. Dublin Silver 1/4=5 4. Central Ohio 4/3=7 5. Chapel 5/5=10 6. Tri-State 6/6=12
Schedule: 12:30 Scioto Valley Brass and Percussion Co. 1:30 Dublin Silver Band 2:30 Chapel at Worthington Woods Salvation Army Band 3:00 Brass Band of the Tri-State 4:00 Fillmore Brass Band 5:00 Chapel Brass 6:00 Brass Band of Columbus 7:00 Central Ohio Brass Band (Host Band) feat. David Thornton
Scioto Valley and CAWW played without adjudication.
June 28, 2015, 8:24 a.m. June 28, 2017, 4:40 p.m.
